manipulations.insert_object: A large lobster pot is inserted onto the kitchen island to the left, with a soft shadow.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the oven from the scene, filling the space with the kitchen cabinets.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the window view with a snow covered mountain range, matching the light direction.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Change the scene to night time, casting long shadows from the overhead lights.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the material of the kitchen cabinets to dark wood, maintaining the existing shape and lighting.
